content.question: Which graph best represents the string at time <math alttext="t equals 3 seconds" overflow="scroll"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi> </math>?

choices.label: The figure shows a triangular wave pulse in a gridded plane. The wave pulse is symmetrical, and is two grid units wide with a central peak one grid unit below the string.
The figure shows a rectangular wave pulse in a gridded plane. The wave pulse is two grid units wide and one grid unit below the string.

The figure shows two triangular wave pulses next to each other in a gridded plane. The wave pulse on the left is symmetrical, and is two grid units wide with a central peak one grid unit above the string. The wave pulse on the right is symmetrical, and is two grid units wide with a central peak two grid units below the string.
The figure shows a triangular wave pulse in a gridded plane. The wave pulse is symmetrical, and is two grid units wide with a central peak three grid units below the string.

content.answer: The figure shows a triangular wave pulse in a gridded plane. The wave pulse is symmetrical, and is two grid units wide with a central peak one grid unit below the string.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
